definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Lignin staining showed an increase in lignification in culms of the overexpressor lines.
sentences.chinese: 木質素着色表明過表達株系莖部木質化增加。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the application of Lignin in oil dilling and recovery technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文系統地綜述了木質素在石油鑽採工藝中的應用。

sentences.english: Alkylation of wheat straw alkaline lignin was conducted by reacting lignin with different alkyl halides .
sentences.chinese: 用不同的滷代烷烴與鹼木質素進行烷基化反應。

sentences.english: The inexpensive and convenient coal water mixture(CWM) additive is prepared by sulfonation modify with sulfate lignin.
sentences.chinese: 利用硫酸鹽木質素改性製備廉價易得的水煤漿添加劑。

sentences.english: The wood sugars are removed and the lignosulfonate is used as a clay deflocculant.
sentences.chinese: 去掉木糖，木質素磺酸鹽可用作粘土解絮凝劑。

sentences.english: In the kraft paper process, lignin is solubilized by caustic soda.
sentences.chinese: 在硫酸鹽槳造紙過程中，木質素被苛性鈉溶解。

sentences.english: The structure unit of lignin is guaiacol.
sentences.chinese: 木質素的結構單元是愈創木基。

sentences.english: This was main cause of polycondensation reaction between phosphoric acid and lignin.
sentences.chinese: 磷酸與木質素髮生縮聚反應是變色的主要原因。

sentences.english: White-rot fungi such as Phanerochaete chrysosporium have ability to degrade lignin.
sentences.chinese: 白腐菌對木質素具有較強的降解能力。

sentences.english: Black liquor also contains lignin from the trees.
sentences.chinese: 黑液木質素還載有從樹上。

sentences.english: It is the high content of lignin in raw hemp that has to be removed.
sentences.chinese: 大麻原麻屬於高木質素含量麻種。

sentences.english: Dye dispersant was synthesized using kraft lignin as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 以松木硫酸鹽木質素爲原料合成染料分散劑。

sentences.english: These technologies and(achievements) are the important base of agricultural utilization of lignin.
sentences.chinese: 這些技術成果是木質素農業化利用的重要基礎。

sentences.english: Synthesis and flocculation performance of a new quaternary ammonium salt of lignin.
sentences.chinese: 新型木質素季銨鹽絮凝劑的合成與絮凝性能。

sentences.english: Lignin is a characteristic component of secondary walls.
sentences.chinese: 木質素是次生壁成份的特徵。
